abstract.para: MidoNet is a network virtualization software for Infrastructure-as-a-Service (IaaS) clouds.
It decouples your IaaS cloud from your network hardware, creating an intelligent software abstraction layer between your end hosts and your physical network.
This guide walks through the minimum installation and configuration steps neccessary to use MidoNet with OpenStack.
